transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, hello.
Customer: Hello. Haan sir, aawaz aa rahi hai meri ab?
Executive: Haan sir aa rahi hai. Sir main keh raha hu, mere company ke, mere company ke jo sir hum do partner mein hai na, toh ek aur partner hai, unko bhi aap group mein join kar dena. Last mein sir aapke hope hai.
Executive: Haan bilkul sure.
Customer: Theek hai, aap se hope hai sir last meri, agar aap kaam karwa sakte hai, aage kar sakte hai sahi profile toh theek hai, nahi toh sir na aap refund ke liye ek baar baat kar lijiyega phir.
Executive: Nahi.
Customer: Dekhiye ek main aapko, aapka naam Nitesh hai na, right?
Executive: Nahi sir, mera naam Shubham hai, mere jo ek aur partner hai, woh Nitesh hai.
Customer: Achha Shubham ji, Nitesh ji dusre hai, right?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan, toh dekhiye ek normal, pehle na main aapko ek cheez bahut simple batata hu. India.
Executive: Dekhiye aisa koi hamari cheezein, cheezein jaldi toh hai nahi. Aapko abhi pure aapke paas abhi aath se nau mahine hai, theek hai?
Executive: Main ek cheez aapko bahut clearly samjha deta hu ki dekhiye, ab main yeh nahi keh sakta, ab aap, ek normal example se samjha deta hu aapko ki agar puri IndiaMART mein ek insaan kaam nahi kar raha toh aisa nahi IndiaMART kaam nahi kar rahi hai, right? Dusri kya hai, aisa ho sakta hai ki sir aapke account mein jabhi toh, dekhiye account mein nahi hai cheez nahi hone ka sabse bada reason yeh hota hai ki woh kaam nahi kar rahe honge us cheez par.
Executive: Theek hai? Toh mere aapse ek do hi request rahegi, ek toh aapko jaise main dekh pa raha hu aapke portal pe bhi ki buyleads nahi le pa rahe hai aap. Maybe reason yeh hai ki buyleads nahi, maybe reason yeh bhi ho sakta hai ki buyleads aa nahi rahi hai aapke paas, right? Dusra reason calls, calls wagera bhi nahi aa pa rahe hai isi wajah se, kyunki dekhiye hum jab isme kya hota hai ki buylead lene ka ek pattern hota hai, theek hai? Woh banega na toh calls bhi increase hote hai aur inquiries bhi aati hai usse, right?
Customer: Achha achha.
Executive: Thoda, thoda, thoda main is product pe bhi kaam kar leta hu, because ab isme kuch cheezein jo kami hai woh main aapko bata dunga, woh main aapko share kar dunga, aap mujhe bata dijiyega main yaha pe update kara dunga, theek hai? Kyunki yeh aapki permission chahiye hoti hai catalog mein koi bhi changes karne se pehle, theek hai? Toh product ki visibility badhegi, product thoda, dekhiye aap bhi yeh samajh sakte hai ki agar aapki shop hai aur woh agar sundar dikh rahi hai toh customers ka jo hai attraction badhega, customers ka traffic woh bhi badhega.
Customer: Haan sir woh cheez main samajh raha hu, aap sahi keh rahe hai.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul, theek hai? Dusri cheez ki sab jo mainly hai aapka buylead ka problem hai, usko main khatam karwaunga. Maine jaise aapko bataya ki aapko buylead hamari or se aati rahegi, theek hai? Agar jo group banega usme agar aapko nahi aa rahi hai toh aap pin kar dijiye, waha mere jo mujhse bade manager hai, senior manager hai, woh bhi waha rahenge available, theek hai? Agar main available nahi hu toh aap unse directly contact dijiye. Hamare yaha aisa koi restriction nahi hai ki aap pehle chhote level pe baat karenge then aap bade level par, aap directly bade level pe bhi ja sakte hai ki agar main achha kaam nahi kar raha hu toh aap unhe bata sakte hai, theek hai? Ab jo agar aapko purana koi commitment aisa hua ki jisme kabhi kabhi aisa bhi ho jata hai ki hamare cheezein nikal jati hai dhyan se, theek hai? Aur main aapse connect, maine ek do baar connect karne ki koshish ki thi but aapka call pick nahi hua aapki side se, so isi wajah se mera connection aapse nahi ho paya, theek hai? Mera naam Amit Sharma hai, theek hai? Main clearly ek cheez aapse keh raha hu ki aapko next agar aapko business nahi, matlab agle teen mahine mein agar aapko business nahi mile na toh aap us cheez, jis cheez ke liye keh rahe hai main us cheez ke liye utarunga, right? Sabse pehle.
Customer: Sir, sir aap, aapne kaha tha ki baat karne ka tarika unka alag hota hai, har kisi ka kaam karne ka tarika alag hota hai. Is cheez ke liye sir main usse agree karke aapse trust kar raha hu taaki aur main yeh nahi chahta sir ki mere ko mahine mein 30 din hai toh 30 din tak mere ko lead aaye. Agar mere ko mahine mein sir 10 lead bhi aa rahi hai, paanch lead bhi aa rahi hai toh at least mujhe yeh rahega ki haan mera package lene ka kuch fayda hai, IndiaMART se fayda hai sir main, meri jab Pranjal sir se baat hui thi toh maine Pranjal sir se yeh kaha tha, sir agar mera kaam sahi chalta hai toh sir main aapko teen package aapse aur kharidunga maine, IndiaMART ka yeh bol tha.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai.
Customer: Ab sir jab mere ko hi sahi response nahi aa raha toh main apne team ko aur dusri company ko kaise sir main usse sponsor kar sakunga, kaise unko yeh bolunga ki sir aap yeh karo? Woh jab mere se puchenge kaisa lead aata hai, dikhaunga unhe dashboard toh sir kya jawab dunga main unko?
Executive: Bilkul, Shubham ji main toh sabse, mera mera manna yahi hai ki pehle hame samne wale ko woh kaam provide karna hai jo hum unse dene ki baat kar rahe hai, uske baad koi baat karni chahiye. Mera seedha ki main aapse dekhiye zyada zyada koi baat nahi karna chahta, main aapko pehle kaam dunga, theek hai? Main aapki cheezein sahi karunga, uske baad main aapse koi commitment ke liye ya koi aur cheez kahunga, right? Pehle aapki problem solve honi chahiye, uske baad koi baat honi chahiye, right sir?
Customer: Ji ji ji, ji sir.
Executive: Bilkul, dekhiye main main main ab yeh keh sakta hu ki yeh jo peeche cheezein jo hui hai us us cheez mein nahi sahi kar sakta but ab main aage jo cheezein hongi unhe main sahi kar sakta hu apne haath se, theek hai? Kyunki mera kaam karne ka tarika yahi hai ki main customer ko pehle mujhe satisfy karna hai pura cheezon se, matlab unhe har business milna chahiye, pehle sabse bada focus yahi hai na ki sir business milna chahiye, right?
Customer: Ji ji ji sir.
Executive: Toh dekhiye saath mein milke business pe focus karte hai, aapke product ko sudharte hai, theek hai? Kuch cheezein aisi hai jo calls wagera ke liye, number wagera update karna hoga koi, koi bhi cheez jo updation chahiye hogi, theek hai? Woh main aapko share karta rahunga, aap mere saath thoda coordinate kijiye, matlab aisa nahi ki main pura din maang raha hu aapse, aap aap 15-20 minute, matlab har ek ghante, do ghante mein 15-20 minute nikal ke IndiaMART par aaiye. Waha buylead, agar buylead option available hai toh theek, nahi toh otherwise mere ko pin kar dijiye main buylead share kar dunga. Usse kya hai buylead consume karne ka ek pattern ban jayega, matlab dekhiye IndiaMART bhi kis tarike se kaam karta hai, jaise ek AI based platform hai, right? Toh us par kya hoga ki jaise jaise jaise jaise aap buylead consume karenge apne local ki ya apne bahar ki toh IndiaMART bhi samjhega ki is tarike ka cheez unhe dena hai, right?
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Jaise aap YouTube par dekhte hai ki aapko agar aap food ki video dekh rahe hai toh food ki videos hi aate hai aapko, bilkul same aise hi yaha pe bhi hai, haan woh bilkul aisi hi cheezein suggest karega recent mein. Aapko kuch nahi karna, sabse pehle aake recent tab open karna hai, usme location lagana hai India ya location lagana hai near by apni, jo bhi aapki city hai, uske near by lagana, then waha aapko buylead dikhegi, woh buylead consume karni hai, theek hai? Do chaar buylead consume karenge toh usme dikhega bhi ki haan customer active hai us cheez par, right? Jab main active hi nahi hu toh phir IndiaMART bhi kya kar sakta hai usme sir, right?
Customer: Nahi sir, main pata woh cheez samajh raha hu sir aapki kyunki profile hamari already complete nahi hui thi, mujhe pata hai. Pranjal sir ne, Pranjal sir ne mere ko bola tha ki profile wagera unhone jo bhi kiya tha, listing wagera unhone kiya tha, theek hai? Uske baad se jab hum pe lead bhi nahi aayi aur main bhi abhi dusre package mein jab woh ho gaya busy aur mere ko yeh bhi yaad nahi raha sir ki IndiaMART pe bhi hamara package hai, theek hai? Kyunki jab usse response hi nahi aa raha tha toh sir mujhe yaad hi nahi raha, phir uske baad jab mere ko dusre partner ne yaad dilaya, bola tab jaake sir maine call kiya aur mere ko zyada time ho gaya yaha se bilkul bhi ek bhi lead nahi aayi thi sir, warna main dhyan deta ispe.
Executive: Bilkul sir.
Customer: Toh abhi sir kya karna hai, kya solution hai woh bataiye mujhe, kya kya mere ko karna padega?
Executive: Abhi dekhiye ek din mein na ek main abhi dekh raha hu aapki inquiry aayi thi paanch tarikh ko, yeh apne usme I am interested bhi mark kiya tha, toh isse baat hui thi aapki? Yeh e-commerce ka hai sir?
Executive: Haan e-commerce ka tha, yeh company thi home page banwane ke liye that paid hai.
Customer: Nahi hua tha sir, isse nahi hua tha.
Executive: Achha nahi hua tha. Dekhiye next time se sir meri hisab se next time se kabhi bhi inquiry aaye toh unpe connect kijiyega, theek hai? Calls pe calls ka rate bahut bhi, matlab keh sakte hai bahut rate zero hi ho gaya hai kyunki buylead apne lena band kar diya toh calls bhi aana band ho gaya, right sir?
Customer: Haan haan ji.
Executive: Toh in cheezon pe thoda sa, dekhiye IndiaMART aapko bhi apni or se use karna padega, kyunki main jo main jo offer karunga woh toh main mere hai hi, saath mein aap mere saath mein kaam karenge toh jabhi business nikalega, dekhiye saath se hi kaam hoga, right sir?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Sabse badi baat yahi hai, theek hai? Toh aap us cheez ke liye tension mat lijiye ki kaam koi nahi hoga, theek hai? Ab mere ko abhi kabhi bhi aap kare toh aap yeh customer service mat kijiye call, directly mere ko call kijiye main number apna provide kara dunga abhi aapko, theek hai?
Customer: Sir yeh mera same number hai, aap isi number pe na group bana dijiyega yeh number add karke.
Executive: Ek minute, ek minute, daal mere ko.
Customer: Aur ek number sir main aapko aur dunga woh mere partner, woh toh sir aap profile se dekh lenge, last mein 110 karke hoga.
Executive: 110 yeh, yeh is number se WhatsApp available hai?
Customer: Haan haan woh Nitesh sir ka hai.
Executive: Achha aur aapka sir yeh 707 wala yeh aapka hai?
Customer: Haan haan 707 wala.
Executive: Last mein 80 se starting hai and 707 yeh last mein yeh aapka hai.
Customer: Haan haan sir haan sir.
Executive: Nahi aapse contact kis se ho payega isi?
Customer: Haan isi number se sir kar lijiyega, yeh mera personal hai.
Executive: Dekhiye isme sir do product main jo dekh raha hu aapka ek Facebook Instagram hai advertising yeh out of stock ho gaya aur isse ab agar yeh nahi aap use kar rahe hai iska buylead bhi aapne past mein liya hai toh sir nahi hai toh sir ise ya toh hata dijiye ya phir ise sir reactivate karaiye.
Customer: Sir sir yeh deactivate karke hame dusre product ispe list karne hai, e-commerce ho gaya, MLM ho gaya is type ki website ho gayi, yeh yeh sare hame list karna hai sir yaha pe.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Aur sir koi aur toh koi issue nahi hai sir iske regarding?
Customer: Nahi sir, nahi sir koi issue nahi hai, bas yahi issue tha sir aur sir main yeh keh raha hu ki aap yeh mere ko bata dijiye kya kya kaise kaise karna hai, meeting arrange bhi kar dunga main jisme mere partner bhi aa jayenge.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul, ek ek ek meeting arrange kar lenge main jisme apne sir ko bhi join kara dunga toh aapko koi bhi agar unke highly regarding job matlab koi bhi doubt hota hai toh aap unhe bata dijiyega, woh bhi solve karenge, main bhi solve karunga saath mein, theek hai? Toh kaam karte hai aur excuse me sir, main bata deta hu aapko.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Main aapko share kar deta hu, aur toh koi issue nahi hai sir iske regarding?
Customer: Nahi sir, nahi sir bas yahi tha ab aapne group bana dijiyega aur haan isse aisa hota hai na ki jaise aap call karte hai toh ek ticket, ek ticket ho jata hai toh phir woh bhi mujhe is cheez ke regarding close karna hoga, mail aayega toh sir aap mail pe yes kar dijiyega, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai sir, theek hai.
Executive: Haan kyunki dekhiye ab main aapke saath connected hu ab, directly aap mere se connect huiye, koi bhi dikkat hoti hai bas main aapse Sunday ke liye request karunga otherwise aur kisi din, aur toh aap kisi din connect kar sakte hai mere se, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai, Sunday tak sir aap meeting fix karenge?
Executive: Nahi meeting toh aap jab aap free hai toh mere ko bata dijiyega WhatsApp par, main bol raha hu Sunday ko agar aap Sunday ko available nahi rehta main bas yeh bolna chahta tha.
Customer: Achha achha aur koi nahi sir main aapko pehle hi bol dunga, ho sake toh main aaj hi mein arrange karwa dunga meeting.
Executive: Aapko koi issue nahi aap evening mein arrange kara dijiyega main evening mein aisa schedule leke connect kara deta hu aapko, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai sir, aap number aapna de dijiye kabhi bhi.
Executive: Hmm, aap apna number de dijiye, main haan main abhi abhi number share karta hu aapke 707 last mein na us pe number share karta hu.
Customer: Ji, ji okay sir kar dijiye, okay.
Executive: Theek hai, thank you sir, thank you so much.
Executive: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to add another partner to group.

- Wants refund if work is not satisfactory.

- Not receiving buyleads and calls.

- Wants to list other products.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to resolve buylead issue.

- Agreed to add another partner to the group.

- Agreed to work on product visibility.

- Agreed to deactivate current products and list new ones.

- Executive shared his direct contact number.

- Agreed to arrange a meeting with senior.



Next Steps: 

- Meeting to be scheduled.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, subscription, profile, products
